com.taptag.custom

Class CustomFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.taptag.custom.CustomFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Categories, MainFragment, Profile, Search, Showcase, Store

    public class CustomFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    The Class CustomFragment is the base Fragment class. You can extend your Fragment classes with this class in case you want to apply common set of rules for those Fragments.
